Agent_completed.name: Agent_completed
Agent_completed.description: Notifies that the user request has completed and there is no more work to be done, or that no more useful progress can be made with the functions.

parameters.name: note
parameters.description: A detailed description that answers/completes the user request using Markdown formatting.

Agent_memory.name: Agent_memory

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The memory key to save, delete, or get

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The content to save to the memory (when operation is 'SAVE')

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description to save to the memory (when operation is 'SAVE')

Agent_memory.returns: Void, or string when operation is 'GET'
